original_text:
John Hunter and the Aztec Treasure
Informazioni generali
Software: Pragmatic Play
Rulli: 5
Linee di gioco: 7776
Importo minimo della puntata: 0,20 €
Importo massimo della puntata: 100 €
Return to Player (RTP): 96,5%
Volatilità: alta
Caratteristiche principali
Con John Hunter and the Aztec Treasure ci troviamo nel secondo capitolo della saga dedicata alle vicende dell’esploratore John Hunter, raccontate in tre slot della software house Pragmatic Play. Mentre la prima puntata della serie, John Hunter and the Da Vinci’s Treasure, aveva suscitato non poco scalpore per l’irraggiungibile montepremi promesso, pari a 48.000 volte la puntata, questa slot ha ricevuto commenti non proprio entusiasti per via del fatto che si tratta, secondo molti, di una sorta di mix tra la famosissima slot Montezuma’s Treasure della Interactive e una specie di prototipo artigianale presente sul motore Megaways.
Il tema del gioco non è nuovo nel mondo delle slot machine: diversi sviluppatori hanno proposto nel loro catalogo delle saghe dedicate alla figura di un esploratore, tra le quali ricordiamo Rich Wilde della Play’n Go e la serie del Libro dei Morti di casa Novomatic.
In John Hunter and the Aztec Treasure ci troviamo immersi nell’antica cultura azteca, con scenari tipici sudamericani e una grafica coinvolgente, che mette in risalto il carattere avventuroso del gioco.
Si può scommettere su questa slot fino a 100 €, ma è possibile giocare anche nella modalità “play for fun”, senza soldi veri, offerta da diversi casinò online. L’RTP è pari al 96,5% mentre la volatilità è alta, il che significa che si possono ottenere delle vincite consistenti ma non con una grande frequenza.
Simboli, Wild e Scatter
Una piramide azteca illuminata da delle torce fa da sfondo ai simboli che si alternano sui rulli: una torcia, appunto, un cappello, un tucano, un serpente, una pantera e ovviamente l’esploratore John Hunter.
Il simbolo Wild è rappresentato da una maschera che riproduce un totem: può comparire solo sui rulli 2, 3 e 4 e sostituisce tutti gli altri simboli, tranne lo Scatter.
Il simbolo Scatter è invece un’antica meridiana e quando appare sui rulli attiva la modalità Free Spins, con un numero di giri gratuiti che varia da 5 a 25. Durante i Free Spins inoltre, tutte le vincite saranno moltiplicate dalle 2 alle 20 volte, e se compare nuovamente lo Scatter si potranno aggiungere ulteriori giri gratuiti a quelli già ottenuti.
Slot simili a John Hunter and the Aztec Treasure
Se avete amato questo capitolo della saga dell’esploratore Hunter, dovreste provare le altre due slot: John Hunter and the Tomb of the Scarab Queen e John Hunter and the Da Vinci’s Treasure. Se invece ciò che vi cattura è il tema storico riferito all’antica cultura azteca, tra antichi tempi e suggestivi totem vi suggeriamo di dare uno sguardo a Montezuma’s Treasure della Interactive, ad Aztec Princess e Aztec Idols della software house Play’n Go e Amazing Aztecs del provider JFTW.

John Hunter and the Aztec Treasure

General Information:
Software: Pragmatic Play
Reels: 5
Paylines: 7776
Minimum Bet: €0.20
Maximum Bet: €100
Return to Player (RTP): 96.5%
Volatility: High

Key Features:
In John Hunter and the Aztec Treasure, we find ourselves in the second chapter of the saga dedicated to the adventures of explorer John Hunter, told in three slots by Pragmatic Play. While the first installment of the series, John Hunter and the Da Vinci's Treasure, caused quite a stir due to the unreachable jackpot promised, which was 48,000 times the bet, this slot has received less enthusiastic comments from many, as it is considered by some to be a sort of mix between the famous Montezuma's Treasure slot by Interactive and a kind of artisanal prototype present on the Megaways engine.

The game's theme is not new in the world of slot machines, as several developers have proposed sagas dedicated to the figure of an explorer in their catalogs, including Rich Wilde by Play'n Go and the Book of the Dead series by Novomatic.

In John Hunter and the Aztec Treasure, we find ourselves immersed in ancient Aztec culture, with typical South American scenarios and engaging graphics that highlight the adventurous nature of the game.

Players can bet up to €100 on this slot, but it is also possible to play in "play for fun" mode, without real money, offered by various online casinos. The RTP is 96.5%, while the volatility is high, which means that significant wins can be obtained, but not with great frequency.

Symbols, Wilds, and Scatters:
An Aztec pyramid illuminated by torches serves as the background for the symbols that alternate on the reels: a torch, a hat, a toucan, a snake, a panther, and of course, explorer John Hunter.

The Wild symbol is represented by a mask that reproduces a totem: it can only appear on reels 2, 3, and 4 and replaces all other symbols except for the Scatter.

The Scatter symbol instead is an ancient sundial, and when it appears on the reels, it activates the Free Spins mode, with a number of free spins ranging from 5 to 25. During Free Spins, all wins will be multiplied by 2 to 20 times, and if the Scatter appears again, additional free spins can be added to those already obtained.

Slots similar to John Hunter and the Aztec Treasure:
If you loved this chapter of the Hunter explorer saga, you should try the other two slots: John Hunter and the Tomb of the Scarab Queen and John Hunter and the Da Vinci's Treasure. If instead, what captures your attention is the historical theme related to ancient Aztec culture, between ancient times and suggestive totems, we suggest taking a look at Montezuma's Treasure by Interactive, Aztec Princess and Aztec Idols by Play'n Go, and Amazing Aztecs by JFTW.

The Wild symbol is a mask totem that can replace all other symbols except the Scatter. The Scatter is an ancient sundial that is used to activate the Free Spins bonus round.

Bonus features

The Free Spins bonus round is triggered when three or more Scatters land on the reels. The number of free spins varies between 5 and 25, and during this round, winnings can be multiplied from 2 to 20 times. If more Scatters appear, extra free spins can be added to those already obtained. John Hunter and the Aztec Treasure does not have a progressive jackpot.

Developer and other games

The slot game John Hunter and the Aztec Treasure is developed by Pragmatic Play. The game is part of a series of three slots, including John Hunter and the Tomb of Scarab Queen and John Hunter and the Da Vinci's Treasure. For players interested in themes related to ancient Aztec culture, other recommended games are Montezuma's Treasure, Aztec Princess and Aztec Idols, and Amazing Aztecs.

Theme and graphics

John Hunter and the Aztec Treasure immerses players in the ancient Aztec culture, which is a common theme in the world of online slots. The graphics are well-designed and dynamic, with the background sound accompanying the visual effects to create a captivating gaming atmosphere. The symbols and colors reflect the adventurous nature of the game, with character symbols representing John Hunter's journey in search of Aztec treasures.
